CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PFDTBT and the ter-polymer solutions exhibited two distinct absorption bands , where the first absorption peak is at around 387 nm , corresponding to the π-π* transition of the conjugated polymer backbone , 23,24 and the second absorption band in the longer wavelength region at around 530 nm , can be attributed to the strong internal charge - transfer ( ICT ) interaction between donating and accepting groups in the main chain.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT (Poly(9,9-dioctylfluorene-alt-benzothiadiazole) |
| ter-polymer solutions |
| conjugated polymer backbone |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT (Poly(9,9-dioctylfluorene-alt-benzothiadiazole) |
| ter-polymer |

Note: "conjugated polymer backbone" is not a material name, but rather a description of a property of the materials mentioned.
